SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

simple.net
Class HttpConnectionController

java.lang.Object
  simple.net.HttpConnectionController

public class HttpConnectionController
extends java.lang.Object

The name is a bit misleading. This class only eases the process of catching and handling errors while performing operations. One day I may expand it to meet its name.
Relies heavily on the HTTPClient package.
Created: Jun 19, 2008

Author:
Kenneth Pierce

getInputStream

public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
Returns a buffered InputStream to the site. Will automatically convert to a GZIPInputStream or DeflaterInputStream as needed. Cannot handle "compress" yet.

Returns:
a buffered input stream from the server.

True if the download is resumable. This may not be accurate.
